name: Lose Temper, Go Down
description:
I will make you feel real dispair. please don't enjoy my game. Doing that physically harms me. So, I made sure to make fun of you as much as possible. Thank you for playing.

Controls :

F to dash 

Arrow keys right and left 

Space to jump 

?? To stop time( figure it out while playing it's hidden)

You have have also a double  jump mechanic pressing space button twice
